xml.data:
Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.5 Saṃsaṭṭhavāra » 2.5.1 Paccayānuloma » 2.5.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Ārammaṇādi
Kusalattika
Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Ārammaṇādi
203.
697Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho kusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā…  adhipatipaccayā…  (adhipati paṭisandhikkhaṇe natthi.) Anantarapaccayā…  samanantarapaccayā…  sahajātapaccayā…  aññamaññapaccayā…  nissayapaccayā…  upanissayapaccayā. (Sabbāni padāni hetumūlakasadisāni.)
<< Hetuup Purejāta >>
